mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, reg_code, function_code, instance_name, function_class, remark, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from insure_function where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.insert: insert into insure_function(id, hosp_code, reg_code, instance_name, function_code, function_class, remark, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{regCode}, #{instanceName}, #{functionCode}, #{functionClass}, #{remark}, '1', #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime})
